160 class PL_DLL_API plDiscreteType : public plType
161 {
162 public:
164  plDiscreteType()
165  : plType()
166  {}
167 
172  plDiscreteType(const plType &other)
173  : plType(other)
174  {
175  if (other.get_var_type() != PL_INTEGER
176  && other.get_var_type() != PL_LABEL && other.get_var_type() != PL_DISCRETE_INTERVAL)
177  throw plError(8, "promoting a plType to a plDiscreteType");
178  }
179 };
180 
181 //=============================================================================
185 class PL_DLL_API plContinuousType : public plType
186 {
187 public:
188 
190  plContinuousType()
191  : plType()
192  {}
193 
198  plContinuousType(const plType &other)
199  : plType(other)
200  {
201  if(other.get_var_type() != PL_REAL && other.get_var_type() != PL_CONTINUOUS_INTERVAL)
202  throw plError(8, "promoting a plType to a plContinuousType");
203  }
204 };
205
